For those interested in CPPNs and HyperNEAT I would also suggest 
starting =
out with a domain that is not too complicated just to get a 
little practic=
e since some of the concepts (like setting up the 
substrate) are novel and=
 take a little practice.   Then with that 
practice you'll have a better se=
nse of what is possible in more 
ambitious domains.

ken
